update biz_agent_order
SN = #record.sn:BIGINT#
ORDER_NUM = #record.orderNum:VARCHAR#
ORDER_TIME = #record.orderTime:TIMESTAMP#
STATUS = #record.status:INTEGER#
RECEIVE_ADDRESS_ID = #record.receiveAddressId:BIGINT#
USER_ID = #record.userId:BIGINT#
TOTAL_PRICE = #record.totalPrice:DECIMAL#
IS_INVOICE = #record.isInvoice:INTEGER#
INVOICE_TYPE = #record.invoiceType:INTEGER#

ADDER_SN = #record.adderSn:BIGINT#

ADD_TIME = #record.addTime:TIMESTAMP#

UPDATE_TIME = #record.updateTime:TIMESTAMP#
REMARK = #record.remark:VARCHAR#
EXTEND = #record.extend:VARCHAR#
QR_PIC = #record.qrPic:LONGVARBINARY#
